abstract.t: This memo specifies semantics for a Middlebox Communication (MIDCOM)protocol to be used by MIDCOM agents for interacting withmiddleboxes, such as firewalls and NATs. The semantics discussiondoes not include any specification of a concrete syntax or atransport protocol. However, a concrete protocol is expected toimplement the specified semantics or a superset of it. The MIDCOMprotocol semantics is derived from the MIDCOM requirements, from theMIDCOM framework, and from working group decisions.
